page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: Schools There is only one school in our block. It is Stawley County Primary School. Children up to the age of 11 come to our school from as far away as Waterrow and Wellington. In September 1985 we shall have 34 children in our school. At the age of 11 children transfer to schools in Wellington or Wiveliscombe. We have two main classrooms, one for Infants and one for Juniors. There is also a building which is used as half office and half library. Soon there will be another room ready for us to use for exhibitions. Our school rabbit lives in the Pet House and we are expecting more animals to arrive in September. We have a school kitchen where lovely meals are cooked and we have a swimming pool.
